The first year of SMGL was designed 
to provide “proof of concept” in the eight 
pilot districts to determine (1) if the SMGL 
interventions could improve health outcomes 
for women and their infants and (2) how these 
interventions could be scaled up as SMGL 
expands. The declines in mortality achieved in
